sentences.sentence: Conclusion Rational nursing care can reduce pain in cystoscopy.
sentences.translation: 结论合理的护理干预能减少患者的痛苦。

sentences.sentence: Ureteral catheters were placed successfully under cystoscopy in 20 patients, but 23 patients failed.
sentences.translation: 急诊膀眺镜下插输尿管导管20例成功，23例失败。

sentences.sentence: Patients' pain feeling were recorded on an VAS (visual analog pain scale) ranging from 0 to 10 after flexible cystoscopy. The pulse and respiratory rate were also recorded.
sentences.translation: 镜检术后立即将患者术中痛感记录在视觉模拟疼痛评分(VAS)量表上(0 ~ 10分)，同时记录呼吸频率及脉率。
